mapper.select: select count(*) from Question where lec_no=#{lec_no} and status='Y'

select q.q_no, q.lec_no, q.m_no, q.title, m.name, q.regdate, q.vcount, q.isreply, q.fileox, originalname, changename from question q join member m on(q.m_no=m.m_no) left join qfile f on(q.q_no=f.q_no) where q.lec_no=#{lec_no} and q.status='Y' order by q.q_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into question values(seq_question.nextval, #{lec_no}, #{m_no}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, default, 0, 0, 0, default, default, default, default, #{fileox})
mapper.select: select q.*, originalname, changename from question q left join qfile f on(q.q_no=f.q_no) where q.q_no=#{q_no} and q.status='Y'
